title: Slash weapons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Slash is an attack type that is used by weapons classes such as Scimitars, Whips and Claws, and secondarily by weapons such as Swords and Daggers.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Slash weapons

Slash is an attack type that is used by weapons classes such as Scimitars, Whips and Claws, and secondarily by weapons such as Swords and Daggers.

Contents

  • 1 Weapons
    • 1.1 Main style
    • 1.2 Secondary style
    • 1.3 Other
  • 2 Best Slash attack bonus
  • 3 Best Slash defence bonus

Weapons[edit | edit source]

Main style[edit | edit source]

  • Axes
  • Claws
  • Longswords
  • Scimitars
  • Battleaxes
  • 2h swords
  • Halberds
  • Whips
  • Scythe (weapon)
  • Machete (weapon)

Secondary style[edit | edit source]

  • Daggers
  • Swords

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Staff of the dead
  • Toxic staff of the dead
  • Salamanders (Scorch attack style)

Best Slash attack bonus[edit | edit source]

Slot Item Slash bonus Notes
Warrior helm +5 Requires 45 and completion of The Fremennik Trials.The fighter hat from Barbarian Assault gives the same slash attack bonus, increases stab and crush attack, and also requires 45 , but has lower Defence bonuses.
Amulet of torture +15 The Amulet of glory gives a +10 bonus, but is significantly cheaper. Requires 75 Hitpoints to wear.
Bandos chestplate +0 Any will work as armour does not provide slash bonus, but Bandos chestplate gives Strength bonus.
Bandos tassets +0 Any will work as armour does not provide slash bonus, but Bandos tassets gives Strength bonus.
Primordial boots +2 Requires 75 and 75 to wear.
Infernal cape +4 Requires completion of the Inferno.
Avernic defender +29 70 and 70 to equip.
Ferocious gloves +16 Requires 80 and 80 to equip and the completion of Dragon Slayer II.
Warrior ring (i) +8 The Warrior ring initially gives +4 slash bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +8.
Blade of saeldor +94 Requires 75 to equip.
Bandos godsword +132 All of the godswords provide the same slash attack bonus. Requires 75 to equip.
TOTAL +182 +173 if using a Blade of saeldor and Avernic defender.

Best Slash defence bonus[edit | edit source]

Slot Item Slash bonus Notes
Justiciar faceguard +63 Requires 75 to be worn.
Amulet of fury +15
Justiciar chestguard +130 Requires 75 to be worn.
Justiciar legguards +92 Requires 75 to be worn.
Guardian boots +32 Requires 75 to wear.
Infernal cape +12 Requires completion of the Inferno.
Ancient wyvern shield +80 Requires 75 and 70 to equip.
Barrows gloves +12 Barrows gloves may take a while to get as it requires completion of Recipe for Disaster, along with a minimum of 175 Quest points.
Ring of suffering (i) +20 The Ring of suffering initially gives +10 Defence bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +20. Requires 75 to wear.
Zamorakian hasta +13 Requires 70 to equip. The Zamorakian spear has the same bonuses, but is two-handed. The hasta requires Barbarian Training and Tai Bwo Wannai Trio.
Dinh's bulwark +145 Requires 75 and to equip.
TOTAL +526 +464 if using the Zamorakian hasta and Dragonfire shield

rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
[[File:Slash style.png|left]]
'''Slash''' is an [[attack type]] that is used by weapons classes such as [[Scimitars]], [[Whips]] and [[Claws]], and secondarily by weapons such as [[Swords]] and [[Daggers]].

==Weapons==
===Main style===

*[[Axes]]
*[[Claws]]
*[[Longswords]]
*[[Scimitars]]
*[[Battleaxes]]
*[[2h swords]]
*[[Halberds]]
*[[Whips]]
*[[Scythe (weapon)]]
*[[Machete (weapon)]]

===Secondary style===

*[[Daggers]]
*[[Swords]]

===Other===

*[[Staff of the dead]]
*[[Toxic staff of the dead]]
*[[Salamanders]] (Scorch attack style)

==Best Slash attack bonus==

! width="10%" |Slash bonus
!Notes

| +5
|Requires {{SCP|Defence|45}} and completion of [[The Fremennik Trials]].The [[fighter hat]] from [[Barbarian Assault]] gives the same [[slash]] attack bonus, increases [[stab]] and [[crush]] attack, and also requires {{SCP|Defence|45}}, but has lower [[Defence bonuses]].
|-
|[[File:Neck slot.png]]

| +15

| +2
|Requires {{SCP|Strength|75}} and {{SCP|Defence|75}} to wear.
|-

| +4
|Requires completion of the [[Inferno]].

|The [[Warrior ring]] initially gives +4 [[slash]] bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via [[Nightmare Zone]] to double the ring's bonuses to +8.

|{{plink|Blade of saeldor}}
| +94

|-

|All of the [[godswords]] provide the same [[slash]] attack bonus. Requires {{SCP|Attack|75}} to equip.

| '''+182'''

|}
